articles.title: Maine bus service topped 2M riders for first time in '19
articles.description: PORTLAND, Maine (AP) — The transit service that serves Maine's largest metropolitan area broke its own ridership record in 2019, when it topped 2 million riders for the first time.
articles.content:
PORTLAND, Maine (AP) The transit service that serves Maine's largest metropolitan area broke its own ridership record in 2019, when it topped 2 million riders for the first time.

articles.title: Wake Forest QB Newman transferring to Georgia for final year
articles.description: ATHENS, Ga. (AP) — With Jake Fromm heading to the NFL, quarterback Jamie Newman announced Saturday he will transfer to Georgia from Wake Forest for his final college season.
articles.content:
ATHENS, Ga. (AP) With Jake Fromm heading to the NFL, quarterback Jamie Newman announced Saturday he will transfer to Georgia from Wake Forest for his final college season.
Newman is coming off his first full year as the Demon Deacons' starter. He completed 6… [+1005 chars]

articles.title: Gardner, Yankees finalize $12.5M, 1-year contract
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Outfielder Brett Gardner and the New York Yankees finalized his $12.5 million, one-year contract on Saturday.
articles.content: FILE - In this Sept. 10, 2019, file photo, New York Yankees' Brett Gardner celebrates his solo home run in the second inning of a baseball game against the Detroit Tigers, in Detroit. Outfielder Brett Gardner is staying with the New York Yankees after the bes… [+1633 chars]

articles.title: Bye, Ricky Gervais: Poehler, Fey to host 2021 Golden Globes
articles.description: PASADENA, Calif. (AP) — Tina Fey and Amy Poehler will share host duties for the Golden Globes ceremony in 2021.
articles.content:
PASADENA, Calif. (AP) Tina Fey and Amy Poehler will share host duties for the Golden Globes ceremony in 2021.
Poehler herself shared the announcement at a TV critics meeting Saturday, just a week after the ceremony aired with Ricky Gervais as host.

articles.title: Dallas midfielder Brandon Servania added to US roster
articles.description: BRADENTON, Fla. (AP) — Dallas midfielder Brandon Servania has been added to the United States' training camp roster ahead of a Feb. 1 exhibition against Costa Rica at Carson, California.
articles.content:
BRADENTON, Fla. (AP) Dallas midfielder Brandon Servania has been added to the United States' training camp roster ahead of a Feb. 1 exhibition against Costa Rica at Carson, California.

articles.title: State agency to probe woman's death in Tulsa city jail
articles.description: TULSA, Okla. (AP) — The Oklahoma State Bureau of Investigations is probing the death of a woman who died while being held in the city’s jail on misdemeanor warrants.
articles.content:
TULSA, Okla. (AP) The Oklahoma State Bureau of Investigations is probing the death of a woman who died while being held in the citys jail on misdemeanor warrants.

articles.title: UK police say it was mistake to call climate group extremist
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — British police say it was an “error of judgment” to include environmental protest group Extinction Rebellion in an official document that listed extremist organizations.
articles.content:
LONDON (AP) British police say it was an error of judgment to include environmental protest group Extinction Rebellion in an official document that listed extremist organizations.

articles.title: 38K lost power in Memphis-centered county in Saturday storm
articles.description: MEMPHIS, Tenn. (AP) — More than 38,000 customers in the Tennessee county that includes Memphis lost power during heavy storms Saturday, a utility said.
articles.content:
MEMPHIS, Tenn. (AP) More than 38,000 customers in the Tennessee county that includes Memphis lost power during heavy storms Saturday, a utility said.
